title: FS: 1908 Ty Cobb American League Publishing Co. PC
author: calvindog

posts.post_title: FS: 1908 Ty Cobb American League Publishing Co. PC
posts.post_content:
Extremely rare Cobb, first one offered since last decade and perhaps not to be seen again.  Email or PM offers.  As I'm not certain I'm selling this card -- as was with the Hubel I recently sold -- make your best offers.  

Edited to add: if you don't hear back from me, it is fair to presume that your offer is at most 50% of the highest offer I presently have. 


[URL="https://www.flickr.com/photos/calvindog/3019102393/in/album-72157607702362661/"][IMG]https://c2.staticflickr.com/4/3195/3019102393_a3ff2c0f8e_o.jpg[/IMG][/URL]<script async src="//embedr.flickr.com/assets/client-code.js" charset="utf-8"></script>

Just WOW!! I was racking my brain trying to give Jeff a reasonable number until I saw someone made on offer on this on Heritage website a few days ago and I'm assuming it's North of that. Straight up beauty, Jeff!!! GLWS
That was me and PM was sent.
